channel.title: Moderator Plz hurry and look, i was hacked!
channel.description: [size=12pt][b]Taken away because my account was hacked and i retrieved it again!!![/b][/size]

item.title: Moderator Plz hurry and look, i was hacked!
item.dc:creator: @Infiniti Infiniti
item.description:
@Infiniti wrote:

dont download!!!
this is my brothers account and it was hacked along with my account .::Ix Miir xI::.

I got this account back by changing pass

EDIT: lol nvm i can take them away

but if you see someone named .::Ix Miir xI::. post tell me and dont download it!!! its my account

EDIT2: if you dont believe me look at the ip’s of the different posts!!!

EDIT3: if people can help me get my account back its name is .::Ix Miir xI::. i wills how that ips for this account and that are the same if you dont believe me

Read full topic
